MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe affecting properties in Market Street, Edleston Road, Chester Bridge and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:29am. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.20pm on 5th November 2020
